chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
n: nat
m: nat
x0: T
u: nat -> nat -> T

Goal:
forall i j : nat, (i < m)%nat -> (j < n)%nat -> coeff_mat x0 (mk_matrix m n u) i j = u i j

Premises:
coeff_mat = fun (m n : nat) (x0 : T) (A : matrix m n) (i j : nat) => coeff_Tn x0 (coeff_Tn (mk_Tn n (fun _ : nat => x0)) A i) j : forall m n : nat, T -> matrix m n -> nat -> nat -> T Arguments m, n are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope _ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
mk_matrix : forall m n : nat, (nat -> nat -> T) -> matrix m n
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
List.NoDup_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i < length l)%nat -> (j < length l)%nat -> List.nth i l d = List.nth j l d -> i = j)
List.NoDup_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i < length l)%nat -> List.nth_error l i = List.nth_error l j -> i = j)
coeff_Tn_bij : forall (x1 : ?T) (u0 : nat -> ?T) (i : nat), (i < ?n)%nat -> coeff_Tn x1 (mk_Tn ?n u0) i = u0 i where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
RList_P6 : forall l : Rlist, ordered_Rlist l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i <= j)%nat -> (j < Rlength l)%nat -> pos_Rl l i <= pos_Rl l j)
mk_Tn_ext : forall (n0 : nat) (u1 u2 : nat -> ?T), (forall i : nat, (i < n0)%nat -> u1 i = u2 i) < -> mk_Tn n0 u1 = mk_Tn n0 u2 where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- Type]
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, (p < ?n)%nat -> ?A where ?A : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : (?p < ?n)%nat, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
mk_Tn_bij : forall (x1 : ?T) (v : Tn ?n ?T), mk_Tn ?n (coeff_Tn x1 v) = v where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
mk_matrix_bij : forall (x1 : T) (A : matrix ?m ?n), mk_matrix ?m ?n (coeff_mat x1 A) = A where ?m : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
ordered_Rlist = fun l : Rlist => forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> pos_Rl l i <= pos_Rl l (S i) : Rlist -> Prop
mk_Tn : forall n0 : nat, (nat -> ?T) -> Tn n0 ?T where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p q : Fin.t ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p = q where ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : Fin.t ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | (i < m)%nat} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | (i < n0)%nat} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => (i < S j)%nat) 0%nat (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => (i0 < S n0)%nat) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | (i < m)%nat} Argument m is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope _]
RList_P12 : forall (l : Rlist) (i : nat) (f : R -> R), (i < Rlength l)%nat -> pos_Rl (app_Rlist l f) i = f (pos_Rl l i)
coeff_Tn = fix coeff_Tn (T : Type) (n : nat) (x0 : T) {struct n} : Tn n T -> nat -> T := match n as n0 return (Tn n0 T -> nat -> T) with | 0%nat => fun (_ : Tn 0 T) (_ : nat) => x0 | S n' => fun (v : Tn (S n') T) (i : nat) => match i with | 0%nat => fst v | S i0 => coeff_Tn T n' x0 (snd v) i0 end end : forall (T : Type) (n : nat), T -> Tn n T -> nat -> T Arguments T, n are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope _ _ nat_scope]
RList_P3 : forall (l : Rlist) (x : R), In x l < -> (exists i : nat, x = pos_Rl l i /\ (i < Rlength l)%nat)
Nat.max_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ f n m = m \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ f n m = n) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.max n m
Nat.min_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ f n m = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ f n m = m) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.min n m
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0%nat (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v -> P (S n0) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (S n0) v)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T |- Type]
gt = fun n m : nat => (m < n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
StepFun_P38 : forall (l : Rlist) (a b : R) (f : R -> R), ordered_Rlist l -> pos_Rl l 0 = a -> pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = b -> {g : StepFun a b | g b = f b /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq g (co_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (f (pos_Rl l i)))}
pos_Rl = fix pos_Rl (l : Rlist) (i : nat) {struct l} : R := match l with | nil => 0 | cons a l' => match i with | 0%nat => a | S i' => pos_Rl l' i' end end : Rlist -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope]
ge = fun n m : nat => (m <= n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
lt = fun n m : nat => (S n <= m)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
Nat.lt_exists_pred_strong : forall z n m : nat, (z < m)%nat -> (m <= n)%nat -> exists k : nat, m = S k /\ (z <= k)%nat
SubEqui_P9 : forall (a b : R) (del : posreal) (f : R -> R) (h : a < b), {g : StepFun a b | g b = f b /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength (SubEqui del h)))%nat -> constant_D_eq g (co_interval (pos_Rl (SubEqui del h) i) (pos_Rl (SubEqui del h) (S i))) (f (pos_Rl (SubEqui del h) i)))}
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0%nat => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Argument scope is [nat_scope]
matrix = fun m n : nat => Tn m (Tn n T) : nat -> nat -> Type Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
